Body:
What We've Learned Updated: Customer is experiencing audio issues on their Dell laptops, specifically around Plantronics headsets.

Expected Result
To be able to use their Plantronics headsets.

Steps to Reproduce
They remove the EPP client and the issue disappear.
We collected logs from the affected machines and also event viewer logs.
Also a short video is attached
Next Steps Updated: Customer to upgrade their EPP Server and Clients to the latest versions released under EPP 5941.
